cSzuWKsyuKI.title: The TRUTH About Home Assistant [Vs SmartThings]
cSzuWKsyuKI.author: ManicMods
cSzuWKsyuKI.description:
For my 1 Month Anniversary on YouTube, I deliver the hard truths of Home Assistant to help people interested in Smart Home technology determine if it's right for them.  Throughout, I use SmartThings, ActionTiles, SmartTools and Hubitat as benchmarks  of automation capabilities and expenditures of time.  If you subscribed to this channel, and you use Home Assistant, please laugh along with me and let me know if you relate.  I'd hate to lose any subscribers, so please do not take personally.  Home Assistant is by far the most powerful automation hub, but it comes at a significant expense of your time and labor.  If you have the brainpower I don't have, more power to you!

‚úÖTruths of Home Assistant from device compatibility, automation power and problems, and dashboards in addition to local capabilities 
‚úÖA satirical guide to some of the HA hardships from RTSP cameras, Nabu Casa Cloud, Google Integration and Wi-Fi operation
‚úÖRequired learning such as YAML, CSS, Python, Node Red, Z-Wave and Zigbee networks
‚úÖSecurity concerns / vulnerabilities of ecosystem including March 2023 Level 10 threat CVE-2023-27482
‚úÖNotable mentions of Hubitat C-8 and Home Assistant Yellow hubs
‚úÖA prelude to Samsung SmartThings local compatibility video and teaser to my ManicModMonday series

*Like what you see?*  It only gets better from here! 

*Nothing* is safe from ManicMods! 

Come join me on an epic adventure to mod the world! üòÅ
